summary: The Chicago Bulls are a professional basketball team in the NBA, based in Chicago. They were founded in 1966 and play at the United Center. The Bulls are famous for their success in the 1990s, winning six NBA championships with stars like Michael Jordan and Scottie Pippen. They set an NBA record by winning 72 games in the 1995-96 season. After a tough period in the 2000s, the team is rebuilding with new talent. The Bulls have a rich history of rivalries and are known for their community work through charity events.
title: Chicago Bulls
